msg: [FELIX-3821][FELIX-3822] Fix behavior when ConfigAdmin is unregistered and unregister all services explicitly

msg: [FELIX-3807] Make sure bundle locks are always acquired during refresh to ensure bundles are stopped

author: gnodet
msg: [FELIX-3803] Bundle#getResource and Bundle#findEntries always try to resolve the bundle (hence grabbing the bundle lock) even if the bundle is already resolved, which contradicts the spec
